event.title: was distributed to 40 service agencies and organizations Tuesday

data.event: More than $133,000 was distributed to 40 service agencies and organizations Tuesday at the Community Foundation of Boone County’s annual Circle of Giving Breakfast.
“If we can continue to match up donors with items of concern to them ... we can do this for many, many years,” Easterday said.
The Zionsville Education Foundation, established in 1995 by the Glassier Memorial Fund and the ZEF’s founders, received $26,217.
The Western Boone Education Foundation received $23,101 from a fund created in 2000 by its board of directors.
